items.text_for_match: Man Utd sign Germany international Schuller Manchester United have signed Germany international Lea Schuller from Bayern Munich until June 2029. Manchester United have signed Germany international Lea Schuller from Bayern Munich until June 2029.

items.ja: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy
items.en: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy
items.text_for_match: Passmoor wants to stabilise Leicester as legacy Leicester City manager Rick Passmoor says his aim was to "stabilise" the club in his first few months in charge and hopes to leave a legacy for others to follow. Leicester City manager Rick Passmoor says his aim was to "stabilise" the club in his first few months in charge and hopes to leave a legacy for others to follow.

items.ja: Leeds 'brimming with confidence' in full-team goal - Hart
items.en: Leeds 'brimming with confidence' in full-team goal - Hart
items.text_for_match: Leeds 'brimming with confidence' in full-team goal - Hart Match of the Day pundits  Joe Hart and Danny Murphy praise Leeds United's build-up play, which resulted in Dominic Calvert-Lewin's equaliser against Sunderland. items.ja: How Raya was able to execute 'absolutely brilliant' save against Brighton
items.en: How Raya was able to execute 'absolutely brilliant' save against Brighton
items.text_for_match: How Raya was able to execute 'absolutely brilliant' save against Brighton Match of the day Pundit Joe Hart breaks down how David Raya was able to execute an 'absolutely brilliant' save for Arsenal in their 2-1 victory over Brighton. items.ja: Miyazawa signs long-term deal with Man Utd
items.en: Miyazawa signs long-term deal with Man Utd
items.text_for_match: Miyazawa signs long-term deal with Man Utd Hinata Miyazawa signs new deal with Manchester United after her previous contract was due to expire in June. Hinata Miyazawa signs new deal with Manchester United after her previous contract was due to expire in June.

items.ja: Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love'
items.en: Jota's widow thanks Liverpool fans for their 'love'

items.ja: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
items.en: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
items.text_for_match: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves Liverpool and Wolves pay tribute to Diogo Jota as his two former sides meet for the first time since his death. items.ja: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.en: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues
items.text_for_match: The best wonderkids outside big five leagues There are plenty of wonderkids catching the eye outside of Europe's big-five leagues - BBC Sport takes a look at the top 10 as ranked by the CIES Football Observatory research group. items.ja: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves
items.en: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves
items.text_for_match: Jota's sons to join mascots for Liverpool v Wolves Diogo Jota's sons will accompany the matchday mascots as the Portuguese's two former sides - Liverpool and Wolves - meet for the first time since his death.
